GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'Send me not to march, but to do justice.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: I wasn't always a wanderer. I was a knight, in service to a wealthy nobleman. But in such service I saw the corruption of money, families, all human endeavors. I seek you only because you know best where my true opponents lie: the cruel, who prey upon the helpless in this broken world. Show me the oppressors, and I shall overlook your imperfections.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: I hunt those who would persist in the blasphemy of helping the weak. How can their plague, which might destroy all civilization, be aided? Those who protect the weak are the enemies of all who might achieve greatness - and thus I shall kill them without hesitation!

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: I hunt those who would persist in the blasphemy of helping the weak. How can their plague, which might destroy all civilization, be aided? Those who protect the weak are the enemies of all who might achieve greatness - and thus I shall kill them without hesitation!

UnitType.Quote: 'We do not delight in war and death, but we must purge this land of those that would corrupt it.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Darvases speaks little of his past, when he was flesh. He cares now only for how the next justice can be done, or the next helpless thing can be saved.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'I will serve you because you are strong. The weak, I will crush.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: I have little to say. Send me to battle, and I shall be alive. Idle, left to tolerate those who are mild and pitiful, I shall diminish. Give me war.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'Wrath. Judgement. I will find the parasitic weak and purge them, even in death.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: Ingrist does not speak. She only hunts those who she believes disorder the world: any that display the slightest weakness.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: I shall not tolerate those that would prey upon the weak. They are under my protection!

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.
UnitType.Backstory: I shall not tolerate those that would prey upon the weak. They are under my protection!

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'I am the shadow that haunts men in their dreams, for they are doomed by weakness to perish.'
UnitType.Backstory: I came to Elemental long ago. Truly the creatures of this world are pitiful, dirtier and more wretched than any existence elswhere. I delight in their suffering and demise. Give me more victims, and I shall combine my power with yours.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'I hunt and eat hunters, that prey might suffer less.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.

UnitType.Quote: 'I hunt alone, for all my kind are weak enough to prey upon.'
UnitType.NPCRecruitmentText: I can be of service. If you wish to hire me for %d gildar.

GameModifier.Provides: -5% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Quote: 'If I must march in armies to protect the forest and its kin, so be it.'
UnitType.Backstory: I was once king of my wild territory. But now I must mind larger concerns, lest evil wilt the few trees that still grow.

UnitType.Description: Henchmen level and can use equipment like champions, but don't divide experience.
